entities.description: Specific codes (e.g., 205W, 210A, etc.) available in the survey response categories.
The count of responses received for a particular response code without any weighting applied.
The percentage of the total survey responses corresponding to each response code.
The total number of valid survey cases.
Indicates whether the agency participates in the National Incident-Based Reporting System (NIBRS).
A date indicating when an agency became inactive.
Data that is not available or not provided in the survey results.

relationships.description: Links a specific response code to the number of responses received for that code.
Links a specific response code to the percentage of the total survey responses for that code.
Indicates the total number of valid survey cases.
Indicates whether the agency participates in the NIBRS program.
Indicates the date when the agency became inactive.
Indicates the presence of missing data in the survey results.
